Text: Tak i mʼumi du wʼunyi O̩jo̩, oñ i fʼoli ugbogaga-wñ ñwa, unabe̩ o̩wo̩ʼka-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩fa, unabe̩ o̩wo̩ ekeji-wñ ño̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩fa ge̩, e-le̩ chʼunabe̩ unyabo le̩.

Unabe̩ alu-wñ ugbo ku ma gudu tʼo̩ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa; oñ iba-wñ ugbo ku ma gudu tʼo̩ le̩ o̩wo̩ʼka-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu, o̩wo̩ ekeji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu; tak i fʼujiji-wñ ñwa, i chʼohibo̩wo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu.
Tak i tʼejefu alo. Oñ i fʼoli ugbogaga alu o̩na le̩ ojika ñwa, i chʼohibo̩wo̩ meji; unefu alu-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩fa; unabe̩ e̩gudu-wñ le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ mebie.
Tak i fʼujiji-wñ ñwa, i chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu, owñ chʼo̩gba unyi O̩jo̩ le̩. Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Ugbo ki afo̩ e-efo̩ de̩.
Tak i fʼo̩do̩ unyi-wñ ñwa, ohibo̩wo̩ me̩fa i che; unabe̩ unyi ki yamo̩ akolo-wñ du chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩le̩; unyi le̩ jʼo̩ta unyi O̩jo̩ daka o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ du.
Unyi unyi ki jʼakolo-wñ le̩ noji omune̩ me̩ta, aluka-wñ ki ro̩nʼomune̩ chʼogue̩gwa. Ab e-le̩ tunyu ogili unyi le̩ ki chʼutodu unyi unyi akolo-wñ le daka, kʼi gwo̩nyʼu, kʼi we gwo̩nyʼo̩do̩ unyi onugo.
Unyi akolo le̩ la nʼabe̩ tule abu kʼi lʼunyi daka tʼate̩ alo. Todu alʼunyi le̩ daka anana alo abu kʼi agba nyʼate̩ ate̩. Oñ abu kʼone̩ ate̩gu i ale gu ef ekeji-wñ du tak i alo tʼe-ki dʼate̩.
U ño̩ li ka kʼunyi le̩ nʼubo̩ ki gba lʼe̩re̩-wñ daka; e̩rane̩ unyi akolo le̩ chʼelikpoʼka odukulu, owñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ lile me̩fa.
Ukpa o̩do̩-wñ ki chʼutodu unyi unyi ki jʼakolo-wñ le̩, ej o̩do̩da-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu. E-kibo̩ ejubi unyi akolo-wñ le̩ chʼe-unyi O̩jo̩ ge̩.
Agbagba unyi unyi le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu lʼunyi le̩ daka o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ du.
Alugbo̩na unyi unyi akolo-wñ la jʼo̩wo̩ ugbo ki bo̩ tane̩, alugbo̩naʼka kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, oñ alugbo̩na omune̩ kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩; oñ uña ki bo̩ tane̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu ale daka.
Oñ unabe̩ unyi ki dʼo̩gba uña ku ma date̩ ojoji o̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ e̩te̩gwa; ukpa o̩do̩ unyi le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu le daka, ujiji-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ e̩le̩gwa.
Abe̩le̩ i fʼunyi le̩ ñwa ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu uña ki date̩ le̩ kpʼunyi-wñ manyʼo̩do̩-wñ, ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu.
Unabe̩ o̩gba unyi le̩ ge̩, kpʼuña ki date̩ o̩wo̩ olodudu chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu.
Tak i fʼujiji unyi ki dʼo̩gba uña ki date̩ ki dʼubi-wñ ñwa oñ o̩na-wñ ugbo ku ma lule̩ o̩wo̩ʼka-wñ kpʼo̩wo̩ ekeji-wñ, chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu; unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu, kpʼagbaru agbaru ologbo le̩,

ajita ajita-wñ ugbo alugbo̩na-wñ, kpʼope-wñ ki che̩re le̩ kpʼo̩na o̩na-wñ ugbo ku ma le unyi ki nʼoji omune̩ me̩ta le̩ daka, ame̩ru ajita alugbo̩na-wñ, ma fʼoli te̩rʼate̩-wñ dab o̩pata le daka, kpʼakwʼane̩-wñ gbogbo wa ope-wñ, e̩wñ la bʼalu ope-wñ ma,
gbogbo tʼate̩ ñw alo̩na, gbogbo wʼunyi ejefu kpʼej o̩do̩da-wñ, kpʼo̩la o̩do̩-wñ ki le daka chaka tʼejefu-wñ tʼejo̩do̩da-wñ, e̩ñwa e̩ñwa i che.
Ma fʼamicherub kpʼoli ki dab e̩kpe̩ le̩ che nyʼo̩la-wñ; oli ki dab ekpe̩ le̩ la dago agbagba che̩rub meji, oñ che̩rub okoke du nʼeju meji eji.
Abe̩le̩ eju one̩ kpʼeju rʼoli ki dab e̩kpe̩ le̩ o̩wo̩ʼka, oñ eju agbadufu idu kparu oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ ekeji-wñ; abe̩le̩ ma che ugbo du lʼunyi le̩ daka.
Akwʼane̩pe̩te̩-wñ gbogbo tʼate̩ ñw alugbo̩na-wñ ma che amiche̩rub kpʼoli ki dab e̩kpe̩ jo̩. Abu kʼo̩do̩ unyi O̩jo̩ de̩ de̩.
I chʼe-unyi ejefu, ma fʼoli alugbo̩na-wñ fa ago̩go̩ me̩le̩. E̩wñʼka dago o̩gba uña kiafo̩ le̩ ki biu
ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ku ma nʼoli che; o̩gba-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩ta, ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ meji; alo-wñ kpʼo̩wo̩ ujiji-wñ kpʼo̩do̩-wñ chʼoli. Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Itebulu ki dʼo̩gba Jihofa le̩ de̩.
Alugbo̩na unyi ejefu kpʼe-uña kiafo̩ chʼe̩kpana meji eji,
alugbo̩na-wñ okoke nʼoli uro̩na meji eji, ejeji-wñ arida; oli uro̩na meji chʼutodu alugbo̩naʼka, eji-wñ la chʼutodu alugbo̩na ekeji.
Ma fʼamiche̩rub kpʼoli ki dab e̩kpe̩ le̩ ko̩ nyʼalugbo̩na unyi ejefu alu ku ma ko̩ nyʼo̩lʼo̩do̩ le̩; o̩joku-nyi ku ma nʼoli che̩ dado agbaru-wñ e̩j o̩doda-wñ.
Ope ope kpʼoli ki dab e̩kpe̩ jʼo̩la o̩do̩ o̩wo̩ agbaru le̩ mej eji. Abe̩le̩ unyi unyi akolo unyi le̩ de̩, kpʼojokunyi ku ma nʼoli che le̩.
